channel.title: How can I edit a server?
channel.description:
Hi all,
I downloaded a server, but now I want to add some shops to it.. change things to my personal likeness. Also I want to change all things like: **Your server name here**, and other things.
How can I change that? Are there any tutorials for that?

item.title: How can I edit a server?
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

What source is it…
if its delta some things are different…
to change ya welcome message to “personal likings”

Difficulty 1/10

THIS IS IN CLIENT.JAVA
search for this THIS WONT BE THE SAME AS THE SERVER YOu HAVE SO SEARCH FOR WAT IT SAYS WHEN YA LOG IN!

sM("Welcome to Your Server..."); sM("Enjoy the server."); sM("New update] : Im so sexy.");

To make xp harder or easier find this in client.java

otalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(100*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(100*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7; where it says (100*hitDiff); change tht to w.e[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2009, 04:38:39 am[/size][hr]Oh keep searcing xp rate till ya changed all of them.

Read full topic
